resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit?
Welcome to Teacher Student PORTAL Application

This app is made for Education purpose.It helps Students and Teachers Communicate easily.

Teachers here are act as Admin. He has the rights to monitor his Students progress. He can post anything related with his given course.

Here A Teacher Can see Student Grade.
Both Teacher and Student can see Class Routine, it will notify them. 

Teacher can send 60% attendence missing warning to a particular student. Those particular student will be able to receive and perform his action to complete his attendance. In fact, this app act like a bridge among Students and Teachers.
1. For Student Account You Have To Be A University Student.\n\n2. For Teacher Account You Have To Be A University Teacher.
